text: I kogato Talut potegli s voiskite, reche: “Allakh vi izpitva s edna reka. Koito pie ot neya, toi ne e s men, a s men e onzi, koito ne ya vkusi, sushto i onzi, koito zagrebe s ruka samo edna shepa.” No pikha ottam, osven maltsina izmezhdu tyakh. A shtom ya pregazikha - toi i povyarvalite s nego, - rekokha: “Dnes sme bezsilni pred Dzhalut i voiskite mu.” A onezi, koito se nadyavakha na sreshtata s Allakh, rekokha: “Kolko malki druzhini sa nadvivali mnogobroini s pozvolenieto na Allakh! Allakh e s turpelivite.”
